data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: My friend Tina wants to be a doctor after college. Her ____ is ____ a ____ at ____ hospital ____ our ____, ____ her ____ is a nurse. Right ____, ____ is ____ biology ____ chemistry ____ university. She wants to help sick children.
data.partBlankContent: My friend Tina wants to be a doctor after college. Her mot___ is al__ a doc___ at t__ hospital i_ our ci__, a__ her bro____ is a nurse. Right n__, s__ is stud____ biology a__ chemistry a_ university. She wants to help sick children.
data.fullContent: My friend Tina wants to be a doctor after college. Her mother is also a doctor at the hospital in our city, and her brother is a nurse. Right now, she is studying biology and chemistry at university. She wants to help sick children.
data.answer: 我的朋友蒂娜大学毕业后想当医生。她的母亲也是我们市医院的医生，她的哥哥是一名护士。现在，她正在大学里学习生物和化学。她想帮助生病的孩子。
